Description: Square trial-piece, with flat edges and a plain flat back, decorated on the front with a sunk relief showing a squatting figure of Heh holding year-signs in each hand. Above the head of the figure is a solar disk with flanking uraei. Traces remain of a yellow plaster background, with remains of a grid in black. Red paint survives on the figure and on the solar disk, green on the collar and black on the wig.
